title: Tachyum Unveils Supercomputer with Over 50 ExaFLOP Performance
description: Tachyum, a Slovak/US company, has revealed its groundbreaking supercomputer, expected to be operational by 2025, boasting an astonishing 50 exaFLOP performance, setting it 25 times ahead of contemporary systems. The key to this colossal leap in computing power lies in Tachyum’s Prodigy chip, a technological marvel that promises to redefine the landscape of data centers, ... Read more

title: EU Identifies Critical Technologies in Economic Security Strategy
description: The European Union (EU) has unveiled its economic security strategy with a laser focus on four critical technology categories. Advanced semiconductors, artificial intelligence (AI), quantum technologies, and biotech have been pinpointed as the initial areas of concern due to their potential to bolster rival industries, military capabilities, and impact on human rights. This move underscores ... Read more
